system.Text:
When __you give ground to a threat through inaction, failure, or delay__, roll on the table below and envision how the change manifests in your world (@Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure).



On a match, this development also exposes a surprising aspect of the threat’s plan or nature.

If __you mark the last box on the threat’s menace track__, the threat achieves its goal, or the final dire outcome occurs. You must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.f968f5e0a837a83a]{Forsake Your Vow}.

Trigger.Text: When you give ground to a threat through inaction, failure, or delay...
